com.ekkongames.elib.gui

Class UIContextMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ekkongames.elib.gui.UIElement
      • com.ekkongames.elib.gui.UIMenu
        • com.ekkongames.elib.gui.UIContextMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants

    public class UIContextMenu
extends UIMenu
    A UIContextMenu is a subclass of UIMenu that displays itself whenever a right click event takes place. Similar to a UIMenu, it supports adding child UIElements that display whenever the menu is visible.
